local_intent: Perceive the T block, approach and align to it within 5 mm, then verify alignment by checking current pose against the block.
assumptions: IsAt(t_block) is treated as a post-condition verifying successful lateral alignment to the block.
coherence_with_global: Respects global perception-first flow, performs guarded ApproachAndAlign (with retry), then verifies before subsequent yaw/contact/push steps.
